EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - TOR End-of-Life - 2015.04.14.Email - Follow up - Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our TOR End-of-Life Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: TOR End-of-Life
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our TOR End-of-Life Webinar! We hope you found the webinar informative and helpful. Your active participation and engaging questions made the difference.
Click here <http://www.tricentis.com/thank-you-page-tor-end-of-life-2015-04-14/> for a recording of this webinar, or visit our Resource page <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/> for more presentations.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Thanks, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Gernot Brandl Product Manager Tricentis
